<<<<<<< HEAD
A hand-kercheffe for a disconsolate soule, to wipe away his sinne, and to keep him from despaire, as though they had never been committed. / By Samuel Spinckes, minister of Gods word. Spinckes, Samuel.
[4], 27, [1] p.
Printed by Thomas Harper, London : 1651.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "July 3". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
